items.title: Real-time Task Updates
items.description: Enable team members to see task status changes instantly across all devices.
acceptance_criteria: When a user updates a task, all team members see the change within 2 seconds.
Task updates are reflected without requiring a manual page refresh.
non_functional: System should handle up to 500 concurrent users without performance degradation.
Updates must be delivered with 99.9% uptime.

items.title: Team Chat Integration
items.description: Provide an in-app chat feature for team members to communicate about tasks.
acceptance_criteria: Users can send and receive messages in real-time within project-specific chat rooms.
Chat history is stored and retrievable for at least 90 days.
non_functional: Messages should be delivered in under 1 second.
Chat service must be encrypted end-to-end.

notes: User request was broad; assumed core collaboration features include real-time task updates and integrated chat. Additional features like file sharing, notifications, and role-based permissions may be needed.
